annotations.description: It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has already been more to see prior to the half-time break than there is in most games during the full 90 minutes. No side has really dominated in this first half. The home side are keeping possession of the ball with some short passes, while the visitors are waiting to open up their defence and hit them swiftly on the break.
